review_text: Groww charts are very basic and the team is not releasing any updates at all. No features like a traders diary, multiple watchlists, order tabs are creating confusion. Events calendar don't have any alert option. No notes to the watchlist. The customer support is very delayed and no one is interested in taking the feedback as well. no updates to groww charts from 3.5 months, groww team is not responding on this at all. Your what's new section writings contain more creativity than your platforms.

Nice app,clean UX.Will be nice to add LRS for investments in foreign MF. And, sector of company is not displayed if it has options chain. Better move sector details into 'About Company' section. And,managing list of stock price alerts in one place is hard to find. Good to provide an edit alerts icon where we open notifications from profile page.

it's a great app, easy to use, but update that we have two options long term stock and short term stock to check portfolio and not to maintain account with different brokers. please look into this update. if this happens it's more beneficial.

taking so much charges in every trade...still so much glitches are there...sometimes you won't able to see your holding postions...charts are so much pathetic...you cannot able to zoom out the chart properly for analysing...please fix this all then take so much charges.. I will just use it for 2-3 months more if there is no changes or improvement I will shift to another app..if you can't improve your app, you should take low charges..

Provide option to see p&l on weekly basis just like it has quarterly ,last30 days option under p&l report ..this will help to track p&l record on weekly basis and save times right now we have to put custome date to see weekly performance

Under reports and Statement section when we view our Stocks P&L the stock are being shown multiple times like duplicates. When we apply filter, still it's malformed data not exactly filtered in a sequence like how to low or low to high. While buying shares when we try to enter amount most of the time it's freezez at 0.02 with red marks by default and I manually have to back press and clear all amount and then enter the correct amount instead it should allow to enter the amount we want not 0.02

Glitch in app permissions, even with SMS permission revoked it can read your SMS/OTPs without your consent! violation of privacy and security. Be cautious while using. 2. App interface is not upto the mark as compared to other brokers. You need to dig into to open charts, option chain and vice versa- slow process.

Team, in Mutual funds -> Dashboard -> All orders, when I change tabs between Stocks, Mutual funds, and Bills & recharges, the list is not refreshing properly. It is appending the data instead of refreshing. Please check and fix, very irritating.

I am not sure why, but Groww’s customer support executives are extremely unresponsive. They appear to be in a hurry to close the chat and often end the conversation on their own without confirming whether the issue has been resolved. After the first query is submitted, there is no opportunity to ask follow-up questions or seek clarification on the solution they provide. Whether the response is understood or helpful seems irrelevant, as the chat is abruptly closed.

The Groww app is very user-friendly and easy to navigate. It makes investing in stocks and mutual funds simple, even for beginners. I really like the clean design and smooth performance. One recommendation: I want an always-on display feature in the Groww app so that live market prices and important data can be viewed continuously without unlocking or reopening the app.

it's not feturefull as zerodha I already complained since 6 months but no action is taken to improve the app. and user experience. 1 No GTT How can I make long standing order? No target order and many other advance feature. 2 Stoploss order section should be immediately changed Nobody can understand how to place it , I lost 1k due to this misleading section and then I got to understand. edit 18/12/25 : it's great now👍🏻 5 star

I've been a groww customer for almost 5 years now. The app is good and the UI is quite simple as compared to it's peers. Some major problems do exit on the backend and haven't received any solution after multiple emails to support. I travel a lot for work and as soon as time zone changes the app keeps taking me back to login page, which is irritating. Same problem is evident to multiple users since past few months but no solution till date. Rest the app works just fine.

I've been using groww since 2022 for all my investments, mutual funds and trading, I've used many other trading apps but groww is best for me but I'd suggest please introduce "Kill switch" for options traders.
user friendly

Groww is an excellent app for investing and trading especially in options. The interface is user-friendly... The app allows to view and trade in equities, options and commodities on a single platform. Many of the previous glitches have been resolved and overall performance has improved significantly. The technical support team is responsive and making the trading experience smooth and nice...

Hello Groww Team, I would like to share some feedback regarding the investment tracking in the app. I have invested a total of ₹43,502.36 in Groww shares. I sold shares worth ₹15,600, so my remaining investment should be ₹28,402.36. However, the app currently shows only ₹25,697. This creates confusion for users trying to track their investments accurately. It would be great if the app could display the correct remaining investment amount to improve transparency and trust. Thank you

Nice app for building investment portfolios but has bugs with its UPI segment. UPI payment works smoothly, the payments are fast, secure and mostly error-free. But recently I have been facing a problem with the UPI transaction history feature. It won't open if I tap it. Grow team plz resolve this bug. I have tried restarting the app but that hasn't fixed the bug behaviour.

Very poor withdrawal experience. The money withdrawal option is pathetic and highly unreliable. There is no clear or committed TAT—payments are processed entirely at their own discretion. This causes unnecessary delays and inconvenience for customers. A financial app should be transparent and timely, which is clearly missing here.
DDPI activation is free as per SEBI rules, but this app charged ₹118. Very disappointing and unnecessary charges. Other apps provide DDPI for free. Please refund and improve transparency.

Groww has proven to be an exceptional trading platform, offering consistently smooth performance across all segments. Its clean, intuitive interface is particularly valuable for fast-paced activities like option trading and scalping. The platform's ability to maintain a simple user experience while delivering powerful features makes it a reliable tool for traders. Everything feels snappy and the indicators are super easy to apply. I love having that level of detail right on my screen. 🤩

Groww is an excellent and user-friendly investment app. The interface is clean, simple, and very easy to understand, even for beginners. It makes investing in stocks, mutual funds, and other financial products smooth and hassle-free. The learning resources and clear explanations help users make informed decisions. Overall, Groww has made investing simple, transparent, and accessible. Highly recommended for anyone starting their investment journey.
